medium: Cotton, silk; supplementary weft patterning, embroidery, appliqué
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
description: Natural ground with burgundy, orange, green, yellow and violet brocade at shoulders and neckline. Appliquéd sunray neck and rosettes on shoulders, embroidered randa. Probably part of a Cofradía costume.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons, in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
